20-0845.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Federal Legislation Committee meeting held Tuesday, June 9, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Richardson, Mungo and AustinPage 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMMONDAY, AUGUST 31, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHFEDERAL LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTES2.

20-0846.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a staff report on the 4th phase of COVID-19 Federal relief legislation and negotiations.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Vice Chair Mungo spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Mungo and Tyler Curley, Managerof Government Affairs.Councilmember Richardson spoke.Chair Austin spoke.A motion was made by Member Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Mungo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Richardson, Mungo and Austin3.

20-0847.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a staff report from Congresswoman Nanette Barragan's office.Joshua Izaak, Legislative Director, Congresswoman NanetteBarragan's office, spoke; and presented the staff report.Chair Austin spoke.Councilmember Richardson spoke.A motion was made by Member Richardson, seconded by Chair Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Richardson, Mungo and Austin4.
